name: streaming-sessionization
title: Spark Streaming - Advanced
description: Deep dive on Spark Streaming with Delta to build webapp user sessions from clicks, with custom aggregation state management.

notebooks.title: Consume data from Kafka - Bronze
notebooks.description: Save kafka events in a Delta Lake table and start analysis.

notebooks.title: Delta streaming, drop duplicate
notebooks.description: Clean events and remove duplicate in the Silver layer.

notebooks.title: Streaming State / Aggregation
notebooks.description: Compute sessions with applyInPandasWithState and upsert (MERGE) output to sessions table.

notebooks.title: Streaming state with Scala
notebooks.description: Compute sessions in scala using flatMapGroupsWithState.
